title: I believe this is a new low from Riot!
body: Why do I have to purchase a god damn Worlds Pass, these are missions, they should be free. Why even make them if you have to purchase such a thing. Worlds finish around 1-2 weeks, how much money do you believe we have to give before you make stuff free, I have already spent around $500 - $600 on your god damn game, my brother has spent around $3100 - $3400 (Don't know exactly because of US $ was spent on his account.) this I believe to be a low point for Riot, as I state above, "Why do I have to purchase a god damn Worlds Pass, these are missions, they should be free."

replies.body: They don't need to give you anything, you already get the game for free...
it's like $12 which is way less than what its worth if u complete missions

The only missions that the pass will give is the "Worlds First Win of the Day", which only gives tokens. Those "bonus" tokens are from just playing games, and unlocked by purchasing the pass. *Literally* every other mission is available without the pass.
